title: How to Grow an Astrological Herb Garden

steps.headline: Find an area of the garden where you can create a circular shape for planting the herbs.
steps.description: Dig and mulch as required in readiness for planting.

steps.headline: Divide the circle into 12 sections, making sure that each section is large enough for each growing herb.
Find suitable herbs for each star sign.
Plant the herbs in the garden space that you have chosen.
steps.description: Make signs to show which herbs relate to which astrological signs, so that people visiting the garden can appreciate its significance.
